mapper.insert: insert into lms_member( name, email, pwd, tel, photo ) values( #{name}, #{email}, password(#{password}), #{tel}, #{photo} )
mapper.select: select member_id, name, email, tel, cdt from lms_member
select member_id, name, email, pwd, tel, photo from lms_member where member_id=#{no}
mapper.update: update lms_member set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, pwd=password(#{password}), tel=#{tel}, photo=#{photo} where member_id=#{no}
mapper.select: select member_id, name, email, tel, cdt from lms_member where name like #{keywordPattern} or email like #{keywordPattern} or tel like #{keywordPattern}
select member_id, name, email, pwd, tel, photo from lms_member where email=#{email} and pwd=password(#{password})
